snippet.title: Trailer for ZOMBEEZ: A Killer Queen Remix
snippet.description:
Introducing ZOMBEEZ: A Killer Queen Remix, the first single-player game in the fantasy world of Killer Queen!

Available on Steam now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1346130/ZOMBEEZ_A_Killer_Queen_Remix/

Developed by BumbleBear Games, the makers of Killer Queen.
Learn more: http://www.bumblebeargames.com/page/zombeez

Built directly on top of the Killer Queen engine, ZOMBEEZ: A Killer Queen Remix is a frantic 2D platformer that takes the skills and techniques found in Killer Queen and applies them to an entirely new experience. Run, fly, and slay your way through the undead horde as you head towards a fated showdown with the terrifying Blood Queen!

Big thanks to our Kickstarter backers, who supported the game under its working title, ABS vs THE BLOOD QUEEN. We’re excited for you to enjoy the game in its new form as ZOMBEEZ!

Video production, editing and animation by Matt Antonucci / Westy Media

#killerqueen #indiegame #zombeez #steamgame #newgame
